snippet: A reputed drug king in Lower Manhattan with a fondness for Starbucks seemed to have a softer side, according to his neighbors.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column details double life led by Dwayne Mitchell, resident of Jacob Riis Houses on Lower East Side who was known both for caring for neighborhood children and for being crack dealer; Mitchell and 10 others have been arrested and named in indictment announced by Manhattan district attorney's office.
lead_paragraph: A reputed drug king in Lower Manhattan with a fondness for Starbucks seemed to have a softer side, according to his neighbors.

headline.main: Book Bags for the Children, and Bags of Crack at Starbucks
headline.print_headline: Book Bags for the Children, and Bags of Crack at Starbucks
